donationTip.title: Donation Tip
donationTip.content: Your donation directly supports the author in creating more quality content. Thank you for your support!

withdraw.title: Withdraw to Bank Card

withdraw.minAmountNote: We recommend accumulating a larger amount before withdrawal to minimize transaction fees
withdraw.processTimeNote: Includes review, processing, and bank transfer time. Actual arrival time may vary due to holidays, banking systems, etc.
withdraw.feeNote: Actual fees vary based on withdrawal amount, destination country/region, and currency exchange
